= Introduction =

SimplyGlobal contains hashes of languages.

{{{
# français
fr = {
    "hi" => "bonjour",
    "welcome" => "bienvenue"  
}

# espanol
es = {
    "hi" => "hola"
    "welcome" => "bienvenidos"  
}
}}}


= Install =

  # Copy the plugin in _vendor/plugin_
  # Create a file named _simplyglobal.rb_ in _config/initializers_
  # Create a `hash` of language
{{{
# français
fr = {
    "hi" => "bonjour",
    "welcome" => "bienvenue"  
}
}}}
  # Add the language `hash` to the object
{{{
SimplyGlobal.add_language_hash(:fr, fr)
}}}
